programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies chase a man who flees a routine traffic stop. Deputies find drugs on a man who gives them an expired license. Officers respond to a man attacking several patrons in a bar.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops

programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1977
programme.desc: If you thought 1977 was all about punk - you might want to think again! Simon Bates brings you a Silver Jubilee year full of pop, soul, disco, country, love & a little bit of rock!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1973
programme.desc: 1973 was another top year in music, as Glam Rock ruled, Paul McCartney did Bond & the UK had its biggest Christmas chart battle ever! Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: 1973 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1973!

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Crooners
programme.desc: 2 hours of smooth intimate songs from some of the biggest singers of the 70s. Including Elvis, Frank, Neil Sedaka, Andy Williams, Roger Whittaker, Barry Manilow & Elton John.

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Bruno Brookes-Never Even A Top 10?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno Brookes-Never Even A Top 10?
programme.desc: Bruno Brookes guides you through the stats in disbelief! Three hours of top tunes from superstars like Bowie, Abba, Bob Marley, Queen, The Who and more. But why didn't we buy 'em?!

programme.title: The 30 Grooviest Stars of the 60s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 30 Grooviest Stars of the 60s!
programme.desc: Another NOW 70s special looking back 1 decade further with the ultimate countdown of 60s stars! Including The Stones, The Beach Boys, Lulu, Sandie Shaw, Marvin Gaye & The Beatles.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's Swinging 60s!
programme.desc: NOW 70s presents 2 hours of classic tunes from the decade before - The Swinging 60s. All brought to you by the man who was there - Sensational Tony Blackburn!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: John, Paul, George & Ringo!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 John, Paul, George & Ringo!
programme.desc: Following their 60s world domination, The Beatles went their separate ways with varying degrees of musical success! Here are some solo videos by the Fab Four from the 1970s & 80s.

programme.title: Stingray Remember the '80s
programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind

programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Offroad & Fun, Part 32
programme.desc: Enjoy a mix of X-Trial acrobatics and highlights from the Tour European Rally.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: This time 4x4 shows unusual SUVs like the Mitsubishi Outlander. However, we're not talking about the regular one, but the world's first plug-in hybrid SUV with two electric engines and a 2-liter gasoline engine.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: For a very long time, Bentley and Jaguar have opted not to produce any SUVs. But after a change of mind, they developed concepts for luxurious SUVs. Are luxury SUVs really necessary or might they even be better than other luxury models?

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Nissan X-Trail and BMW X4 do not look like your typical off-roader's. But with all-wheel drive, strong diesel engines and different prices they adapt to the living conditions of many people.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: A spring ride around Lake Starnberg in the Ferrari 458 Italia, a test drive of BMW's 6 series convertible at Table Mountain in South Africa, and a look at the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Audi A6 2.0 TDI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Wiesmann MF5.

programme.title: Nurburgring 24 Hours
programme.desc: Nurburgring 24 Hours

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMW's 6 series models.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the world's most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesn't fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The German Rally Championship has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. That's why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1954, Mercedes returns to the Grand Prix circuit after 20 years of abstinence.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late 1950s in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. These small cars were seen on tracks until the end of the 1970s, but their heritage would live on through an association known as Historic Formula V Europe.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Die-hard Porsche fan Marco Wendlandt makes his dream of driving a 1984 Porsche 911 coupe come true.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Die-hard Porsche fan Marco is on an epic road trip through California. With his newly bought ˜84 Porsche 911 coupe, Marco heads to L.A. to meet one of the best known Porsche enthusiasts of the world.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: On his journey to Las Vegas, Marco drops by Big Mike in the Apple Valley, a remote area in the High Desert of California; together they meet Big Mike's bizarre friends from the Lowdown Kustos family.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: An angry bull, a few English people prepared for the weather and a young, talented race driver - tourists will be venturing down to the infamous 'green hell' of the Nuerburgring.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A tuned-up Golf 2, a family sedan from Hannover, Germany and a very special Porsche GT2.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring has transformed into a winter wonderland. Although it looks pretty, it is not pretty to use as a race track.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Fog, rain and snow means that a visit to the Eifel region isn't that pleasant.

programme.title: Offroad & Fun, Part 32
programme.desc: Enjoy a mix of X-Trial acrobatics and highlights from the Tour European Rally.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 14
programme.desc: The King of the Roads season finale, a journey into eSports with the first DTM eSports Championship shootout, and the British GT.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 14
programme.desc: The King of the Roads season finale, a journey into eSports with the first DTM eSports Championship shootout, and the British GT.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: If there is hardly any grip on the street, traction is really important. Supercars shows cars like the Porsche Panamera 4S that can utilize their high performance to drive forward in the winter, too.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A look at Alfa Romeo's 4C model and Rolls Royce's Ghost, what divides them, and what do they have in common.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: An up-close look at Jaguar's three flamboyant cars that pack a punch like no other.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car on TV

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Tuned and customized vehicles are scored based on speed, style and sound; among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: This time 4x4 shows unusual SUVs like the Mitsubishi Outlander. However, we're not talking about the regular one, but the world's first plug-in hybrid SUV with two electric engines and a 2-liter gasoline engine.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: For a very long time, Bentley and Jaguar have opted not to produce any SUVs. But after a change of mind, they developed concepts for luxurious SUVs. Are luxury SUVs really necessary or might they even be better than other luxury models?

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Nissan X-Trail and BMW X4 do not look like your typical off-roader's. But with all-wheel drive, strong diesel engines and different prices they adapt to the living conditions of many people.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Super Cars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: These days there's hardly a car manufacturer who doesn't build any kind of SUV. Three of the sportiest SUVs on the market are the Porsche Macan Turbo, Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and Audi RSQ3. Each of them comes with more than 300 HP.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is the most dynamic sedan in the world. No other car finds the perfect balance between calm gliding on the one hand and extreme performance on the other hand.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Mercedes presents its first plug-in hybrid car with the S500. With an electric range of 33 kilometers, a declared average consumption of 2.8 liters, and a system output of 442 horses the S500 is the most efficient luxury car on the market.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 1
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: For this route from Ruhpolding (GER) to Kasern (ITA), 210 kilometers and more than 10000 meters of vert, recreational athletes need approximately five to seven days. Benedikt Boehm is aiming for the magic time limit of 36 hours, non-stop.

programme.title: Underdog

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Swissway to Heaven
programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachat's adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA

programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 startet im Januar in ihre 16. Saison - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Stopp der Tour findet in Baqueira Beret statt.

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship - Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: On todays show we’re taking care of not only the gasheads but also the fans of water sport as we head down under to see what a lot of power on a small boat can do with the Australian V8 Superboats.

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Bürser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam - Stikine River & Place of Happiness
programme.desc: Outdoor Sports Team 2014:Stikine River: Kayaking the Grand Canyon of the Stikine River (British Columbia, CAN / Alaskan Panhandle, USA) A place of happiness: Athletes Mayan Smith-Gobat (NZL) and Ben Rueck (USA) explore the highest monolith in Brazil.

programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championships 2021 | Rd. #1-3
programme.desc: V8 Superboats is one of the most extreme and spectacular forms of motorsport on the planet. Imagine 1600-horsepower in a purpose-built aluminium boat that can accelerate to 120kph in under 2-seconds, and turn with the kinds of G-Forces.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Mammut Swiss Irontrail 2013
programme.desc: The spectacular Swiss Alpine region of Graubünden is the setting for one of the toughest ultra trail races in Europe. This event truly embodies the essence of mountain running with breathtaking views - this is the Swiss Irontrail!

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: Climb
programme.desc: Triathlete Neil Myers was nearly killed in a horrific training accident on Gibraltar Road in 2018. One year later he an his team won the 2019 Santa Barbara Triathlon.

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: “Catch the Moment” portrays athletes from all over the world such as American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. She is considered one of the most stylish professional longboarders, but has also made a name for herself as a photographer

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #13: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Eternal Flame
programme.desc: To jump from the top of Nameless Tower in Pakistan (6200m) after climbing the Eternal Flame route is to combine the ascent of one of the most beautiful climbing routes in the world with the opening of one of the most breathtaking BASE jumping exits imaginable.

programme.title: The history of competitive Snowboarding
programme.desc: This Competition is in human nature. But that was far from the thoughts of early pioneers in the nineteen hundreds or those of Mister Sherman Poppin of Michigan. In the Christmas of 1965 he invented the Snurfer. This changed the history of snowsports.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part II
programme.desc: The Barrel is a cinematic tribute to those big-wave moments. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.title: Tenerife Blue Trail
programme.desc: We are back in Tenerife, one of the highlights of the ultra running calendar, for the 10th edition of the Tenerife Blue Trail. Tenerife is described as an outdoor gym open 365 days a year - a paradise for every athlete.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - European Karting Championship
programme.desc: Karting is a great life school for young people. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: Kald Sòl
programme.desc: The film sheds light on the surprising resources of cold countries, and on the search for waves guided by climatic uncertainties. Samuel Redon, a young professional surfer accustomed to warm-water surfing, is about to discover a whole new world of surfing.

programme.title: Nendaz Freeride FWT Challenger - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The third FWT Challenger delivered an unforgettable day full of action on the legendary Mont Gond wall. Perfect conditions for the 63 riders from all over Europe, the USA, New Zealand and Japan.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Prologue
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 3
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #2 Canada
programme.desc: The second stage of the tour will revisit champagne powder paradise Kicking Horse near Golden, British Columbia (CAN).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary

programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.desc: 2 hours of nothing but great knockouts and exciting fights.
